name: Ranelagh Pte Ltd
description: Operator of a healthcare information and appointment booking platform intended to offer quality content and interaction with qualified Indonesian doctors. The company's platform provides credible information, supportive communities, doctor appointment booking, and in-depth reference material about health subjects as well as offers various information about the illness, treatment, and healthy living guide, enabling users to make informed health decisions during emergencies.

name: Ambience Healthcare, Inc.
description: Developer of an artificial intelligence-powered medical scribe designed to capture the nuances of clinician-patient conversation in real-time into a comprehensive note. The company's auto scribe offers state-of-the-art speech recognition, real-time documentation, and custom-built AI to embed into EMR workflows and generate notes within seconds and customize to individual preferences to reflect each provider's style and voice, enabling clinicians to get home on time every day with all of their charts closed by the end of their shift.
one_liner: Developer of an artificial intelligence-powered medical scribe designed to capture the nuances of clinician-patient conversation in real-time into a comprehensive note. The company's auto scribe offers state-of-the-art speech recognition, real-time documentation, and custom-built AI to embed into EMR workflows and generate notes within seconds and customize to individual preferences to reflect each provider's style and voice, enabling clinicians to get home on time every day with all of their charts closed by the end of their shift.

name: Inofab Health Technologies
description:
Inofab Health has joined Carbon Health by 2022 April! 

Inofab Health® is a digital health company that offers revolutionary respiratory care solutions for home and professional use with a human-centric approach and cutting-edge technology. It provides a software platform for functional respiratory care management, state-of-the-art ultrasonic personal & clinic spirometers, along with connected inhaler attachments with a strong focus on misuse detection. Inofab Health alerts any declines in lung health, allowing quick intervention against symptom onset and preventing unnecessary hospitalizations.
one_liner:
Inofab Health has joined Carbon Health by 2022 April! 

Inofab Health® is a digital health company that offers revolutionary respiratory care solutions for home and professional use with a human-centric approach and cutting-edge technology. It provides a software platform for functional respiratory care management, state-of-the-art ultrasonic personal & clinic spirometers, along with connected inhaler attachments with a strong focus on misuse detection. Inofab Health alerts any declines in lung health, allowing quick intervention against symptom onset and preventing unnecessary hospitalizations.

name: Careport Health, Inc.
description: Provider of software to facilitate post-acute hospital care. The company offers a web-based platform enabling hospitals, patients and post-hospital care providers to coordinate and manage care across the post-acute care continuum. The platform includes tools enabling real-time data and alerts for patient management, evaluating patient outcomes and assisting patients in selecting post-acute providers from hospitals' preferred networks.
